sense.def:
To blink
ali
to blink one's eyes
pomeni zelo na hitro zapreti oči in jih spet odpreti.

seg.quote: They looked at him without blinking.
The girl blinked her eyes several times.
It was his guilty blink that gave him away.

sense.def:
Kadar svetilka
blinks
, se prižiga in ugaša.

seg.quote: Dots and dashes blinked out from a signal light.
